name: Blog on Brands
tag_list: social-media, marketing, branding, social-networks, blogs, brands, product-testing
overview:
We connect blogs and brands.

Brands invite bloggers to test their products or service, and blogs write true reviews about them.

Bloggers apply for campaigns and brands choose those that best fit their needs, in base of a complete profile.

Brands can view relevant data such as traffic stats, origin and language of visits, social media influence etcetera.

We monitor conversations generated by each campaign, and track the results: Unique visitors, unique pageviews, shares, retweets, likes, latest comments…

All information is ratified by thir party web applications like Google Analytics, Topsy, Bitly, Facebook, Twitter, Klout, Vimeo, Youtube, Linkedin, Google +…

Blog on Brands is a small company based in Europe.
